Actions.Name: Grappling Hook
Actions.Description: The Gunner teleports adjacent to a summon or object in range 3. Alternately, it can teleport adjacent to a foe in range, and that foe becomes shattered.

Actions.Name: Suppressor Turret

Summons.Name: Gun Turret
Summons.SummonEffects: When a foe in range 4 from the emplacement is damaged by an attack or ability, the emplacement deals 1 piercing damage to that foe, ignoring cover. This effect can trigger any number of times a round.
